channel.title: ASF JIRA

item.title: [FLINK-23634] BatchingStateChangeUploaderTest.testDelay fails on azure

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fix merged as 0d09f76fa3542afae9119e96a928e7f49a308a71.
And thanks for reporting and letting me know Xintong Song
